org.osmdroid.google.wrapper

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.google.wrapper.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.api.IMapController

    public class MapController
extends Object
implements org.osmdroid.api.IMapController
    A wrapper for the Google com.google.android.maps.MapController class. This implements IMapController, which is also implemented by the osmdroid MapController.
